attributes.action: Better inform the public as to the implications of where they spend their money
attributes.additional_details:
Humanitarian groups have to work hard to release important information to the public (via film, social media and events) that should be given to us immediately; before we make buying decisions. More value is put on economic development than on Human and planetary health and, in the process, we are treated like lucrative lab rats.

"Racing Extinction", "Ten Million": Two films recently released to try to inform the public of dangers that should never have been hidden to encourage industry.
attributes.background:
In a modern-day slave culture, people have less time and money which forces them into making decisions that benefit multi-million £ businesses at the detriment of their health and the health of the planet.

Regardless, they should still, at least, be fully informed before making their decisions.
